thelastpromise
Class AttackUnit

java.lang.Object
  thelastpromise.Object
      thelastpromise.Unit
          thelastpromise.AttackUnit
Direct Known Subclasses:
Archer, ArchMage, Butcher, FireSpirit, Horseman, Knight, Mage, Swordsman
public class AttackUnit
extends Unit

This class extends the Unit class and is used to send the drawing information for the AttackUnit to its parent Unit class so it can be drawn, and to highlight the tiles that the AttackUnit can move to if it is selected.
